response.explain: The previous action code failed because the robot was not within two meters of the fridge. Therefore, the robot needs to move closer to the fridge before attempting to open it.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take the cheese tart from the fridge
(4) Close the fridge
(5) Open the oven
(6) Put the cheese tart in the oven
(7) Close the oven
(8) Turn on the oven to cook the cheese tart
